p.s: In the following text I am going to sum up an extract from a text written by ana German volunteer who tells us about her experience working in an Education Center located in India.
In India she had a full day, starting up at 08:30 and being at the center all day was normal for her, at the center she taught the children englishEnglish.
She enjoyed working with the kids there the most, the kids were full of love and acceptenceacceptance, which they showed her a lot.
What was also really special was their love for life, even though they have terrible life conditions and go troughthrough so much on daily basis, you can't see that in Germany as much.
Especially when she was tired they made her happy, she says, those days are the most amazing and valuable days of her life.
After volunteering she was filled with love, patience, hope, thankfullnessthankfulness and confidence.
